newsitem.title: BAHRAIN: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi newspapers - May 20.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi newspapers - May 20.

text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the Saudi Arabian press on Tuesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Two British nurses charged with killing their Australian colleague appear at al-Khobar court.
- Five Nigerians, an Afghani man were beheaded in Saudi Arabia for armed robbery and drug smuggling.
- Philippines embassy appoints a Saudi lawyer to defend Bernie Morante, held for killing an American couple.
- Riyadh governor Prince Salman will on Tuesday open a meeting in Riyadh of European Union and Gulf Arab states.
- Agriculture and water ministry issues new licenses to set up 42 new agricultural projects at a cost of 202 million riyals.
